description:
What This Course Will Help You Achieve?

This course is going to make you a great Pot Limit Omaha Player.

Is the presenter competent enough?

I am the author of the book “How To Crush Pot Limit Omaha” it is available on Amazon for purchase.

I have been playing poker for over 10 years now. I am creator several poker books online by the name Viktor, Peter Zhang and Kim Ishida. My courses have sold for hundreds of dollars each and I have over 25 courses on Amazon and you can search by the pen names that I have provided. I have coached individual students and done 1 on 1 with them and helped them succeed, these students have been from various parts of the world like USA, Russia, Czech.

Through my books I have helped players around the world and I have also been on House Of Cards Radio Show which is broadcast in several states in USA introducing my books to the listeners by the pen name Viktor. So basically I have a lot of experience with poker and I have played at virtually ever  poker network and have millions of hand and have used software’s like HM2  to analyze my game and cover my leaks.

Why this course is a must buy for every Omaha player

I am giving you along with this course my complete Omaha course “How To Crush Pot Limit Omaha” which contains such great advice for PLO players that it will help them become competent players very quickly, filled with dozens of common mistakes, dozens of equity situations that you must know about and over 50 examples to which to learn it is a great learning reource.

It even contains hands by the world’s best pros of PLO like Jason Mercier actual hands played by them in the WSOP event.

On top of that you have the author doing 3 live sessions for you on PokerStars and giving you tips while playing two tables of zoom poker as an added incentive.  

Finally I will go over the HM2 and give you a brief overview as to why every player needs this to eliminate leaks from their games and how you could use it to become better.
title: Play Pot Limit Omaha Like The Pros
